example: A modern curriculum should teach both knowledge and skills.

Scholarships help talented students access higher education.

Qualifications can improve employment prospects.

Academic performance can be affected by family support.
Reducing dropout rates requires financial and emotional support.

meaning: lấy người học làm trung tâm
example: Student-centered approaches encourage active participation.

Peer pressure can influence students’ study habits.
Discipline in schools creates a better learning environment.
Motivation is essential for sustained progress.
Clear learning outcomes help students focus on key goals.
Assignments develop research and writing skills.
